scripts.server: npm run clean && npm run compile && node --enable-source-maps dist/main.js
scripts.test: rimraf dist/tests && npm run compile && node --test
scripts.seed-offerings: npm run clean && npm run compile && node dist/seed-offerings.js
scripts.try: npm run clean && npm run compile && node --enable-source-maps dist/client-test.js
scripts.example-create-issuer: npm run clean && npm run compile && node --enable-source-maps dist/example/create-issuer.js
scripts.example-create-customer: npm run clean && npm run compile && node --enable-source-maps dist/example/create-customer.js
scripts.example-issue-credential: npm run clean && npm run compile && node --enable-source-maps dist/example/issue-credential.js
scripts.example-rfq: npm run clean && npm run compile && node --enable-source-maps dist/example/request-for-quote.js
